item.title: I-15 South - Exits 325 and 324
item.description: I-15 south at Exit 325 - UT-225/Park Lane. Approaching Exit 324 - (UT-67)/Legacy Parkway.

item.title: US-89 South - Exits 395 and 394 - Approaching I-15
item.description: US-89 South at Exit 395 - UT-225/To I-15 North/Park Lane/Lagoon. Approaching Exit 394 - (UT-67)/Legacy Parkway. US-89 joins I-15 southbound for Salt Lake City. Use Exit 395 for access to Lagoon Amusement Park.

item.title: US-89 South - Exits 396 and 395
item.description: US-89 south at Exit 396 - UT-106/Shepard Lane. Approaching Exit 395 - UT-225/To I-15 North/Park Lane/Lagoon. On the left is a sign showing that trucks are prohibited on Legacy Parkway.

item.title: Legacy Parkway - Exits 12 and 13
item.description: Legacy Parkway (UT-67) north at Exit 12 - UT-225/Park Lane. Approaching I-15 North/Ogden. Approaching the northern end of Legacy Parkway.

item.title: I-15 South - Exits 325 and 324
item.description: I-15 south at Exit 325 - UT-225/Park Lane. Approaching Exit 324 - (UT-67)/Legacy Parkway.

item.title: I-15 South - Exits 325 and 324
item.description: I-15 south approaching Exit 325 - UT-225/Park Lane. Also approaching Exit 325 - (UT-67)/Legacy Parkway.
